name: Dale, The Cake Guy [KOLLATION COMBAT! DLC]
name_original: Dale, The Cake Guy [KOLLATION COMBAT! DLC]
description:
Dale isn’t a Middle Manager. Doesn’t even want to be! He was just “volun-told” to pass out sweet treats to celebrate Garfiedus, Demonic Lord of Mondays as the company’s new owner. There’s only one piece left, so you’ll have to share.


Also, it may be a transmogrifying horror beyond comprehension...

Dale, The Cake Guy is the first DLC for KOLLATION COMBAT!, and is the first part of Quarterly Report #1. Deal with the ever-transorming CAKE CARD. It could give you a redo on a failed action, but whoever is left holding it at the end of the turn could suffer for holding it! If you wondered what playing KOLLATION COMBAT! and Hot Potato was like, wonder no longer - here it is!

This mark signifies this content to be from the original game creator and to be canon content!

Also, purchasing this gives you a discount on Quarterly Report #1, so you can get the rest of the DLC  this quarter for cheaper!
